description: This file contains a test suite for the ChatInput React component, specifically testing the Jira connector selector flow, including fetch mocking, user interactions, and DOM assertions.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Sets up fetch mock before each test for Jira connector search results.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Defines a test case for the Jira reference selector triggered by typing in ChatInput.

search-terms: Testing user interactions in React with Testing Library
